description: This is an excellent app. It's very simple, but has just enough that it doesn't get in the way and let's you get on with things. I highly recommend this, especially to people who can't seem to find where all their attention is going.
summary: Great app, very simple and helps me stay on track

description: The timer doesn't restart after changing the settings. The timer doesn't continue immidiately after the session is over. It just doesn't feel right
summary: Needs some more features and qol improvements

description: Great app, would recommend
summary: Great app, would recommend

description: Solanum does one thing, and it does it right. It fits in with my GNOME desktop, and the form factor is perfect for this kind of application. It isn't overloaded with extra features, and only does just what I need. The use cases for it are many: Schoolwork, coding, hobbies in general, etc.
summary: Does exactly what you'd expect

description: doesnt respect GTK_THEME flatpak setting
summary: not so good

description: I haven't had any bugs occur, which is the most important thing for a simple app like this. Seems to follow Gnome HIG so thats cool. Nice looking and practical. I use this along with Furtherance to manage my studying.
summary: Best pomodoro app on Linux

description: Just hat to download it because it was one of the first officially published apps using gtk4
summary: Works and is one of the first gtk4 app

description: Otherwise this app is good
summary: Not a a fan of the logo

description: Minimalist, functional!
summary: Nice App

description: It does what it says but with no apparent way to modify the time lengths or notification sounds/length.
summary: Average+

description: The app works, but you can't customize anything.
summary: No way to modify the times

description: Fedora GNOME 40, I use adwaita dark but this app stays white.
summary: No dark theme

description: If you want to do anything other than the standard 25 to 5 pomodoro technique then this is not the app for you. If you do want standard pomodoro but want a dark theme, this is not the app for you. There are zero options for any customization and even they keyboard shortcuts offer no value at all. If you want the bare minimum a pomodoro app should have then this will be fine but other than that . . . keep looking. I hope they improve it though, it has potential.
summary: Accomplishes the basic task but thats it

description: Helps me a lot to get work done.
summary: Simple to use

description: The app ignores your theme, dark mode doesn't carry over onto the app. Other than that it looks and works great... please allow themes I want dark mode...
summary: Great app but

description: That's a great app if you want something simple and easy to use, without functionality overloads. It has a polished design and the app does its job well.
summary: Is it complex? No. Does it work perfectly? Yes

description: This might be my favourite pomodoro app. Love the simple and graceful design.
summary: Looks great, gets the job done

description: Great, minimalistic app that helps you concentrate by adding frequent short breaks. Other reviews are saying that dark mode doesn't work, but dark mode works for me on Fedora 36 GNOME 42.1.
summary: Both app and dark mode work

description: a simple app that does what it has to do, and nothing more
summary: SImple And Elegant

description: Works well enough, but it'd be nice if the lap counter sustained beyond each "set." Currently it resets the lap counter after every long break. Not a huge deal, but you have to remember the number of sets yourself if you want to log your time.
summary: Does its job but could use lap counter past long break

description: Me gusta mucho su interfaz pero es demasiado simple, me gustaría un registro de los pomodoros hechos junto con un sistema de etiquetas para saber cuanto tiempo le dedico a cada tarea.
summary: Buena, pero muy minimalista

description: В трей не сворачивается, запускается ужасно долго, работает только в заявленном "помидорном" режиме, то есть свои интервалы времени задать не получится.
summary: только если вам действительно очень нужен помидор
